mapper.insert: /*HomeTaxMapper.createTax*/ INSERT INTO HOMETAX ( SEQ, MYID, DAY, WATER, ELEC, GAS, INTER, MANAGERFEE, MONTHFEE, TOTALFEE, RESTFEE, INPUTFEE, DEL ) VALUES( SEQ_HOMETAX.NEXTVAL, #{myid}, #{day}, #{water}, #{elec}, #{gas}, #{inter}, #{managerfee}, #{monthfee}, #{totalfee}, #{restfee}, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: /*HomeTaxMapper.getAllTaxList*/ SELECT H.DAY, H.TOTALFEE, H.RESTFEE, H.INPUTFEE , M.NAME FROM HOMETAX H , HOME_MEMBER M WHERE H.MYID = M.MYID AND H.DAY= #{day}
/*HomeTaxMapper.getTotalData*/ SELECT SUM(WATER), SUM(ELEC), SUM(GAS), SUM(INTER), SUM(MANAGERFEE), SUM(MONTHFEE), SUM(TOTALFEE) FROM HOMETAX GROUP BY DAY HAVING DAY = #{day}
/*HomeTaxMapper.chkTax*/ SELECT M.NAME, H.DAY, H.TOTALFEE, H.RESTFEE, H.INPUTFEE, H.DEL FROM HOMETAX H , HOME_MEMBER M WHERE H.MYID = M.MYID AND M.MYID = #{myid} AND H.INPUTFEE > 0 ORDER BY H.DAY ASC
mapper.insert: /*HomeTaxMapper.insertTableInput*/ INSERT INTO HOMETAX_INSERT ( TAXSEQ, MYID, INPUTFEE, DAY ) VALUES( #{seq}, #{myid}, #{inputfee}, #{day} )
